meanings.definition: The condition of having one or both testes undescended.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the baby with cryptorchisms.
meanings.sent2: Cryptorchisms can lead to fertility issues later in life.
meanings.sent3: The circus clown joked that he must have cryptorchisms because he couldn't juggle properly.
meanings.sent4: His cryptorchisms were like hidden treasures waiting to be found.
meanings.sent5: The image of cryptorchisms stuck in his mind, haunting him with worry.

meanings.definition: The failure of one or both testes to descend into the scrotum.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian explained the risks associated with cryptorchisms in dogs.
meanings.sent2: Cryptorchisms in cats may require surgical intervention.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome joked that his cryptorchisms were the reason he couldn't stand up straight.
meanings.sent4: His cryptorchisms were like stubborn guests refusing to leave the party.
meanings.sent5: The concept of cryptorchisms was as elusive as a shadow in the dark.
